OOC: Do you control the falling piece or do you want me to do it?

Bic: Tyrael and Cheetah being some distance away, the shields were 
still on.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "x_rauq_x" <x_rauq_x@y...> wrote:
> -- Artifact Piece 2 --
> 
> At the same time as the first artifact piece was crashing near the 
> Maximal base, a second piece materialized several kilometres above 
> the Tripred base, and began to plummet downward. It would strike the 
> shields or the base itself in seconds. Although no energy readings 
> would show up on the scanners, hitting the base would attract 
> attention.
